issue.title: [C++] Detect ORC system packages
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3052](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3052). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/cmake_modules/ThirdpartyToolchain.cmake#L155. After the CMake refactor it is possible to use built ORC packages with `$ORC_HOME` but not detected like the other toolchain dependencies
